text: Angélica Vale (born Angélica María Vale Hartman; November 11, 1975) is a Mexican-American actress, singer, and comedian. She is known also as the daughter of Angélica María. She is known for her role as the protagonist of La Fea Más Bella (The Prettiest Ugly Girl), a Mexican telenovela, with her real- life mother. She starred in the webnovela No me hallo as Luchita Guerra. Early in 2012, Vale was a team captain on the Mexican TV Show Parodiando, of Televisa network. Vale became a U.S. citizen in 2016, while retaining her Mexican citizenship. ==References== ==Other websites== * * at tv.com * Webnovela No Me Hallo – Angelica Vale Category:1975 births Category:Living people Category:Mexican movie actors Category:Mexican television actors Category:Mexican voice actors Category:Mexican singer-songwriters Category:Mexican comedians Category:Naturalized citizens of the United States Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:Actors from Los Angeles Category:Actors from Mexico City Category:Comedians from Los Angeles Category:Singer-songwriters from California
title: Angélica Vale
